plot: Captain Marleau teams up with a famous cop after her old acquaintance is charged with murder.

Royan. An acquaintance of Marleau's is accused of murder. Alex Weller, renowned police officer jointly-appointed to the investigation, seems convinced of her guilt, but Marleau doubts his sincerity. Between illicit cigarette dealing, precarity and social revenge, there are plenty of motives amongst the inhabitants of a neighbourhood threatened with demolition.—TV5Monde Europe
